title.native: 聖闘士星矢 THE LOST CANVAS 冥王神話
title.romaji: Saint Seiya: THE LOST CANVAS - Meiou Shinwa

description:
A Holy War, from ancient mythology, where the Goddess Athena and Hades have fought against each other while defending the earth repeatedly over the span of 200 years. The story takes place in 18th century Europe, 243 years prior to the original "Saint Seiya" Three small children, Tenma, Alone, and Sasha have all shared a very happy childhood together. Tenma who is quite aggressive but upstanding has moved to Sanctuary to become a saint. It is there that he is reunited with Sasha who is the sister of Alone and learns that she is the reincarnation of Goddess Athena. Alone, who is kind, gentle and loves painting was chosen for the body of enemy King Hades. Tenma eventually becomes a saint of Pegasus and engages in a fierce battle with his best friend Alone, the King of Hades. Pegasus Tenma, King Hades, and the Goddess Athena and through the twist of their 3 fates merge together which unfolds a prologue to the original Saint Seiya.

(Source: TMS Entertaiment)
synonyms: Los Guerreros del Zodiaco: El lienzo perdido
Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco: The Lost Canvas

tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Astronomy
tags.description: Relating or centered around the study of celestial objects and phenomena, space, or the universe.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

node.description:

He is a Japanese music composer. Married to voice actress [Akiko Nakagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/95749/Akiko-Nakagawa).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/芝美奈子)

Noted for her character designs on [Black Butler](https://anilist.co/anime/4898/), [Noir](https://anilist.co/anime/272/), [Tegami Bachi](https://anilist.co/anime/6444/) among many others.

Noted for her character designs on [Black Butler](https://anilist.co/anime/4898/), [Noir](https://anilist.co/anime/272/), [Tegami Bachi](https://anilist.co/anime/6444/) among many others.
**Tomoko Fukunaga** is a Japanese animator and animation director.

An italian actor, voice actor, ADR director and dialogue writer, mostly known for his roles as [Piccolo Jr.](https://anilist.co/character/914/) and [All For One](https://anilist.co/character/125956/).
__Tomoki Nagasaka__ is a Japanese editor who works for post production studio Jay Film.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/吉原俊一郎)

Affiliated with studio Bihou.
